subject: Data
title: The Future of Data Value
description: A micro-lesson that makes The Future of Data Value usable.

hook.text: In 2010, data was a byproduct. In 2020, it's the product. In 2030, it may be a right.

buildup.text: The data economy is evolving from extraction to negotiation as users and governments demand a fairer deal.

discovery.text: New business models are emerging: privacy as a premium, data portability, and user-controlled data vaults.

twist.text: AI's hunger for data is accelerating â€” making data simultaneously more valuable and more contested.

climax.text: The next decade will determine whether data empowers individuals or just the corporations that collect it.

punchline.text: Data's value is rising. The fight is who captures it.

quiz.question: How is the data economy evolving?
options: From extraction toward negotiation and user rights
